name: mermaid-mcp-app
description: Interactive Mermaid diagrams with streaming preview, theme switching, and fullscreen editing.
long_description: An MCP App server that renders Mermaid diagrams with streaming preview animations, theme customization, interactive pan/zoom, and fullscreen editing mode. Supports all Mermaid diagram types including flowcharts, sequence diagrams, class diagrams, state diagrams, and more.

tools.name: read_me
tools.description: Returns the Mermaid syntax reference with examples and tips. Call this before using create_view.

tools.name: create_view
tools.description: Renders a Mermaid diagram with streaming preview animations and interactive features.
